com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.setup

Interface ISetupStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddInitialGamestateSetupStep, EmptySetupStep, InitScriptingSetupStep, LoadMainConfigSetupStep, LWJGLAddErrorCallbackSetupStep, LWJGLInitGLFWSetupStep, LWJGLRegisterCallbacksSetupStep, LWJGLSetDebugStreamSetupStep, RedirectScriptOutputSetupStep, RedirectSystemOutputSetupStep, WindowContextManageSetupStep

    public interface ISetupStep
    A callback that will be executed to configure the engine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBuildUp(IEngineContext engineContext)
      Called to prepare the engine for running.
      void onTearDown(IEngineContext engineContext)
      Called to clean up after the engine has ran.
